thread.title: Drake and Future Get Matching Diamond-Studded Rings to Celebrate 'WATTBA' Success
thread.title_full: Drake and Future Get Matching Diamond-Studded Rings to Celebrate 'WATTBA' Success

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Drake and Future Get Matching Diamond-Studded Rings to Celebrate 'WATTBA' Success
text:
Comments The two show off the diamond-covered rings adorned with the OVO and FBG logos after their joint mixtape debuted at No. 1 on Billboard 200 a few weeks ago. 
Drake and Future got matching big rings to celebrate the success of their joint mixtape, " What a Time to Be Alive ". On early Monday morning, October 12, the Canadian rapper posted on Instagram a video of him proudly showing off the custom-made ring he received from his collaborator. "Big rings from my brother @future. Champion Sound OVOFBG," Drake captioned the clip that offers a glimpse at the diamond-studded ring adorned with the OVO logo and owl. He wears it on his pinky finger in a photo he uploaded shortly after. A video posted by champagnepapi (@champagnepapi) on Oct 11, 2015 at 10:04pm PDT A photo posted by champagnepapi (@champagnepapi) on Oct 12, 2015 at 1:00am PDT Future gave closer and clearer look at his and Drake's matching rings in a photo he shared on his own Instagram page. He thanked New York City-based jeweler Elliot Avianne in the caption, saying, "My bro/jeweler @elliotavianne always kno how to bring my vision to life...world champions." A photo posted by Future Hendrix (@future) on Oct 12, 2015 at 8:45am PDT "What a Time to Be Alive" debuted at No. 1 on Billboard 200 after its release late last month. The mixtape gave the two rappers their second No. 1 album in 2015. Drizzy previously landed atop the list in February with his other surprise release " If You're Reading This It's Too Late ", while Future scored his first No. 1 record on the chart back in July with " DS2 ".
